title: LF Bronze DuoQ Partner
body:
Hi guys,
I'd like to think I'm better than the Bronze 5 group I've been placed in, however seem to always have bad luck when it comes to AFK's and players who aren't great. I understand that it is partly my fault and that some of the calls I make in game aren't up to par of a Gold/Plat Elo however I am willing to learn and am always looking to improve. I like to pride myself on the fact that I don't rage/slander people for making silly mistakes as I know this is part of the game however am looking to climb Elo's this season and am looking for more serious players to play with. Add IGN to play.

replies.body:
Hey,

I have a similar thread. Add me - Dr Pill Popper.

I like your attitude. Most people in this bronze hell, don't usually accept that they made  a bad call or misplayed some battles. That is the most important step to getting better imo. 

I'm b2, was s5 last season. Lets jam some games!
